Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
BTO.Users
BTO.Applicant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Search<String>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Officer
public class Applicant extends Users
Represents an applicant in the BTO system. This class extends Users and implements Search, providing logic for applying to BTO projects, handling application workflows, and managing personal enquiries. An applicant can:
  • Apply for a BTO project (based on eligibility)
  • Withdraw or book BTO units
  • Create, edit, or delete enquiries
  • Interact with the system through a user menu
Fields include application ID, linked BTO ID, room type, and a list of submitted enquiries.
Version:
16/4/25
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String nric, String name, int age, String password, boolean married)
      Constructs an Applicant object with default role set to "applicant".
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      name - the name of the applicant
      age - the age of the applicant
      password - the login password
      married - the marital status of the applicant

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String nric, String name, int age, String password, boolean married, String role)
      Constructs an Applicant object with a specified user role (e.g., officer).
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the user
      name - the name of the user
      age - the age of the user
      password - the login password
      married - the marital status
      role - the role to assign to this user (e.g., "applicant", "officer")

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationId

      public int getApplicationId()
      Returns the application ID associated with this applicant.
      Returns:
      the application ID, or -1 if none exists

    • getEnquiriesId

      public List<Integer> getEnquiriesId()
      Returns a list of enquiry IDs submitted by the applicant.
      Returns:
      list of enquiry IDs

    • getBTOId

      public int getBTOId()
      Returns the BTO project ID associated with the applicant.
      Returns:
      the BTO project ID, or -1 if none exists

    • getRoomType

      public int getRoomType()
      Returns the room type selected in the application.
      Returns:
      the room type (2 or 3), or -1 if not set

    • setRoomType

      public void setRoomType(int roomType, String nric, String role)
      Sets the room type for the applicant, if validated by the role and NRIC. Used by officers to update applicant profile after successful booking.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the new room type to assign
      nric - the NRIC used for validation
      role - the role of the user attempting to make the change

    • getApplicableBTOs

      public List<BTO> getApplicableBTOs(List<BTO> btoList)
      Returns a list of BTO projects this applicant is eligible to apply for. Eligibility depends on marital status, age, and room availability.
      Parameters:
      btoList - the list of all BTO projects
      Returns:
      a filtered list of applicable BTOs

    • canApplyBTO

      public boolean canApplyBTO(BTO bto, int roomType)
      Checks if the applicant meets criteria to apply for a specific BTO and room type.
      Parameters:
      bto - the BTO project to check
      roomType - the room type requested (2 or 3)
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise

    • createApplication

      public Application createApplication(BTO bto, int roomType)
      Creates a new BTO application for this applicant, if eligible. Updates internal state with application ID and BTO ID.
      Parameters:
      bto - the BTO project to apply for
      roomType - the room type requested
      Returns:
      the Application object created, or null if ineligible

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication(Application application)
      Requests to withdraw a successful or booked application. Only allowed if the current application ID matches and role is correct.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to withdraw

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw()
      Resets the applicant's current application state. This method clears the BTO ID and application ID, effectively marking the user as having no active application in the system. It is typically called after a successful withdrawal or administrative reset.

    • bookBTO

      public void bookBTO(Application application)
      Requests to proceed with booking a unit for a successful application. Only allowed if current application is in "successful" state.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to confirm booking for

    • createEnquiries

      public Enquiries createEnquiries(String inpEnquiry, int btoId)
      Creates a new enquiry related to a BTO project. The enquiry ID is stored internally for future reference.
      Parameters:
      inpEnquiry - the enquiry text
      btoId - the BTO project this enquiry is related to
      Returns:
      the Enquiries object created

    • editEnquiries

      public void editEnquiries(Enquiries enquiry, String inpEnquiry)
      Edits an existing enquiry submitted by the applicant. Only editable if the enquiry belongs to the applicant.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry object to edit
      inpEnquiry - the new enquiry content

    • deleteEnquiries

      public void deleteEnquiries(int enquiryId)
      Deletes an enquiry by ID if it belongs to the applicant. Removes the ID from internal tracking.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the ID of the enquiry to delete

    • printApplicant

      public void printApplicant()
      Prints applicant information including name, NRIC, age, marital status, and application details (if available).

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu(Project<BTO> btoProj, Project<Application> appProj, Project<Enquiries> enquiryProj)
      Displays the applicant menu and handles user interaction for: viewing BTOs, applying, checking applications, and managing enquiries.
      Parameters:
      btoProj - the project containing all BTOs
      appProj - the project containing all applications
      enquiryProj - the project containing all enquiries
